condition: [NOT]([AND]([EQ](<*VALUE(MIB Configuration Required?)*>,Yes),[EQ](<*VALUE(Server Mounting)*>,Cabinet),[OR]([EQ](<*VALUE(Interface with TPS Required?)*>,No),[EQ](<*VALUE(Interface with TPS Required?)*>,))))
name: Server_Mounting_Msg_Rule
description: If Rack (Cabinet) is selected as Server Mounting, when MIB Configuration Required? is selected as Yes & Interface with TPS Required? as selected as No, then display message in the top of the section as 'For MIB, recommended Server option is Tower (Desk)'
